doc:
William Dieterle https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Dieterle 0 William Dieterle (July 15, 1893 – December 9, 1972) was a German actor and film director, who worked in Hollywood for much of his career. His best known films include The Devil and Daniel Webster, The Story of Louis Pasteur and The Hunchback of Notre Dame. His 1937 film The Life of Emile Zola won the Academy Award for Best Picture. William_Dieterle ( July_15_,_1893 – December_9_,_1972 ) was a_German_actor_and_film_director , who worked in Hollywood for much of his_career . His_best_known_films include The_Devil_and_Daniel_Webster , The_Story of Louis_Pasteur and The_Hunchback of Notre_Dame . His_1937_film The_Life of Emile_Zola won the_Academy_Award for Best_Picture .
